column1: Kata Robata////I had a piece of a friend's sushi roll (one with asparagus
column2: peppercorn tuna and yellowtail) and I thought it was just ok
column3: but to be fair it's not a roll I would have ordered as my own sushi taste is rather plebian and more Americanized. Â It's probably better quality than my comments would indicate and I'll admit that
column4: it's just not what I prefer.
